mapper.select: select a.*,b.HOMENAME,b.HEATINGAREA,b.HEATINGSTATUS,c.HEATINGDAY,d.HOODNAME from HT_HOMEFEE a inner join HT_HOME b on a.HOME=b.HOMENO inner join HT_HEATINGPRICE c on a.HEATINGYEAR=c.HEATINGYEAR inner join (select home.HOMENO,neighbourhood.HOODNAME from HT_HOME home inner join HT_NEIGHBOURHOOD neighbourhood on home.HOODNO=neighbourhood.HOODNO ) d on on a.HOME=d.HOMENO where FEENO=#{feeno}
